forbidden_routes.doc: A list of routes that may not be created (either as an identical or partial match).

component_partial_prefix.doc: The prefix used to namespace component partials

component_lang_namespace.doc: The top-level namespace in component localization JSON

external_components.doc: Where external components are located, relative to project root
